Idiom
in triplicate
Add to word list
Add to word list
an original and two exact copies: Every form was filled out in triplicate.
in triplicate
Add to word list
Add to word list
if a document is prepared or written in triplicate, two exact copies are also made of it: The license to purchase must be filled out in triplicate at the time of the transaction.
